text: Va Alloh taolo [naxustin] sumoro az xoke ofarid va on goh [farzandonas] az nutfae [padid ovard]; sipas sumoro cuftho [-i jakdigar] qaror dod. Hec [condori] modae ʙordor namesavad va zojmon namekunad, magar ʙo donis [va ogohii] U; va hec [condori] kuhansole umri tuloni namekunad va az umras kosta namegrdad, magar on ki dar kitoʙe [Lavhi mahfuz] saʙt ast. Ba rosti, ki in kor ʙaroi Alloh taolo oson ast
